titulo: Optimal combination of low embodied carbon construction products, technical building systems and circularity principles for climate neutral buildings (Built4People Partnership)
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Measurable reduction in whole life carbon emissions[1] and uptake of carbon removals in buildings;Increased integration of circular approaches for building construction and renovation works, with the aim of minimising lifecycle impacts;Availability of more accurate benchmarks and calculations of typical buildingsâ€™ whole life carbon emissions and carbon removals, based on Level(s) and consistent
